description: We take our burritos very seriously.The Burrito Bus is our catering truck i modified to sell mexican food out of... The Fresh Burrito is our Tent style kitchen setup that we use at big festivals. Our business is based out of Newark, Ohio (East of Columbus)..but you can find us at music festivals and city events all over the country. The Burrito Bus is kept near downtown Columbus and will be operating at different CBUS spots for lunch dinner and late night. We are available for catering to big offices.jobsites parties with prior notice. If you think you need us or have an event we should be involved in feel free to contact me...Thanks.... Eat Burritos And Live Well!!!!
name: The Burrito Bus
